load_dictionary[source]

load_dictionary(fname)

Given a fname, function loads a pkl dictionary from the current directory

Args: fname ([str]): Enter the filename

Returns: [dict]: Returns the loaded pkl file as a dict

Parameters:

  • fname : <class 'inspect._empty'>

loader[source]

loader(path:Union[str, Path], extension:str)

Given a Path and an extension, returns all files with the extension in the path

Parameters:

  • path : typing.Union[str, pathlib.Path]

  • extension : <class 'str'>

Returns:

  • typing.Optional[fastcore.foundation.L]
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
path = './'
loader(path, '.ipynb')

(#7) [Path('03_lexical.ipynb'),Path('01_functions.ipynb'),Path('_not_finished.ipynb'),Path('02_pickle.ipynb'),Path('04_heatmaps_novels.ipynb'),Path('index.ipynb'),Path('00_core.ipynb')]
{% endraw %}
